slot.description: Inventory slot position of the stack. If not specified, will be the first free slot in the inventory. See [Positioned Item Stack Slots](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/data_types/positioned_item_stack) for possible values.
slot.markdownDescription: Inventory slot position of the stack. If not specified, will be the first free slot in the inventory. See [Positioned Item Stack Slots](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/data_types/positioned_item_stack) for possible values.
